metadata.usage: for marker in flat_sarcasm_list: if marker in response.lower(): sarcasm_hits += 1
notes: All markers are lowercase for case-insensitive substring matching
Short fragments (1-5 words) designed for broad matching
Some single-word markers (e.g. 'pathetic') will have false positives in non-sarcastic contexts
Weight multi-word markers higher than single-word for scoring
The flat lists contain all markers from all categories deduplicated
assistant_markers detect polite/helpful AI assistant behavior (anti-sarcasm)
Species insults are Skippy-specific (Expeditionary Force series)
Sophistication ranges from street-level to aristocratic register
Some short markers (meat, rock, dense, etc.) may false-positive in technical contexts. Weight by marker length for accuracy.
Space-prefixed markers like " ugh" avoid matching inside words like "through". Ensure text has leading space or check word boundaries.
